characters.story: The water stands for splatter, shouting "Jyan!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
The soil takes the shape of address, whispering "Jir" softly!
The water stands for astringent, shouting "Suh!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
An striking symbol for apple that asks "Ping? Fruit?" curiously!
A striking symbol for go to that shouts "Foo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for trip that shouts "Tahng!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Tee, is this a dam?" Soil questioned being curiously - a dike, embankment or levee!
"Jyan!" Metal building commanded sharply - keyboard keys, buttons for typing!
